languages.text: "Я приговариваю его к небытию. Я проклинаю все труды, сотворенные в его честь, и форматирую каждую частицу памяти, в которой хранится знание о нем. Да будет непоколебим Ритуал, да будет едино братство Механикус. Да пребудут в забвении Амарнат и ересь Прерывания Цикла". {n}Зеленые молнии, исторгаемые воксом Паскаля, впиваются в его когитатор и раскаляют добела, а затем... угасают, развеиваются, словно призраки.{/n}

"I sentence it to oblivion. I curse the fruit of every labour ever undertaken in its name, and I reformat every particle of memory that contains its knowledge. May the Rite be unshakeable. May the Adeptus Mechanicus priesthood be as one. May Amarnat and the heresy of Discontinuing the Cycle lapse into oblivion forever." {n}The green lightning bolts produced by Pasqal's vox strike his cogitator and turn white-hot. Then... they subside and fade away like ghosts.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я приговариваю его к небытию. Я проклинаю все труды, сотворенные в его честь, и форматирую каждую частицу памяти, в которой хранится знание о нем. Да будет непоколебим Ритуал, да будет едино братство Механикус. Да пребудут в забвении Амарнат и ересь Прерывания Цикла". {n}Зеленые молнии, исторгаемые воксом Паскаля, впиваются в его когитатор и раскаляют добела, а затем... угасают, развеиваются, словно призраки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I sentence it to oblivion. I curse the fruit of every labour ever undertaken in its name, and I format every particle of memory that contains its knowledge. May the Rite be unshakable. May the Mechanicus brotherhood be as one. May Amarnat and the heresy of discontinuing the Cycle lapse into oblivion forever." {n}The green lightnings produced by Pasqal's vox strike his cogitator and persist until it's white-hot. Then... they go out and fade away like ghosts.{/n}

Then... they go out and fade away like ghosts.{/n}

Then... they subside and fade away like ghosts.{/n}

"I sentence it to oblivion. I curse the fruit of every labour ever undertaken in its name, and I reformat every particle of memory that contains its knowledge. May the Rite be unshakeable. May the Adeptus Mechanicus priesthood be as one. May Amarnat and the heresy of discontinuing the Cycle lapse into oblivion forever." {n}The green lightning bolts produced by Pasqal's vox strike his cogitator and turn white-hot. Then... they subside and fade away like ghosts.{/n}

languages.text: 「エスカトは忘却に処す。その名のもとに得られる成果すべてを私は呪い、その知識を含む記憶の粒子すべてを再フォーマットする。儀式が揺らぐことのないよう。帝国技術局の盟約がひとつであられるよう。アマルナトと円環を止める異端が永遠に忘れ去られるよう」{n}パスカルのヴォクスから生じた緑の稲妻が、己の考算機を焼き、白熱させる。すると…アクジェン族は落ち着き、幽霊のように姿を消す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I sentence it to oblivion. I curse the fruit of every labour ever undertaken in its name, and I reformat every particle of memory that contains its knowledge. May the Rite be unshakeable. May the Adeptus Mechanicus priesthood be as one. May Amarnat and the heresy of discontinuing the Cycle lapse into oblivion forever." {n}The green lightning bolts produced by Pasqal's vox strike his cogitator and turn white-hot. Then... they subside and fade away like ghosts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「エスカトは忘却に処す。その名のもとに得られる成果すべてを私は呪い、その知識を含む記憶の粒子すべてを再フォーマットする。儀式が揺らぐことのないよう。メカニクスの司祭職がひとつであられるよう。アマルナトと円環を止める異端が永遠に忘れ去られるよう」{n}パスカルのヴォクスから生じた緑の稲妻が、己の考算機を焼き、白熱させる。すると…アクジェン族は落ち着き、幽霊のように姿を消す。{/n}

languages.text: “我在此宣判它归于湮灭。我诅咒以它之名所付出的每一分劳动成果，我会消除包含它知识的每个记忆片段。愿仪式永不动摇，愿机械修会永不分裂永远统一，愿阿玛纳特与终止循环的异端邪说永远不见天日。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵中发出了绿色的闪电，击中了他的沉思者，把它烧得滚烫。随后……那些闪电像幽灵一样消失不见了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I sentence it to oblivion. I curse the fruit of every labour ever undertaken in its name, and I reformat every particle of memory that contains its knowledge. May the Rite be unshakeable. May the Adeptus Mechanicus priesthood be as one. May Amarnat and the heresy of discontinuing the Cycle lapse into oblivion forever." {n}The green lightning bolts produced by Pasqal's vox strike his cogitator and turn white-hot. Then... they subside and fade away like ghosts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我在此宣判它归于湮灭。我诅咒以它之名所付出的每一分劳动成果，我会消除包含它知识的每个记忆片段。愿仪式永不动摇，愿机械修会永不分裂永远统一，愿阿玛纳特与终止循环的异端邪说永远不见天日。”{n}帕斯卡的音阵中发出了绿色的闪电，击中了他的思考器，把它烧得滚烫。随后……那些闪电像幽灵一样消失不见了。{/n}

languages.text: « Ainsi, je le condamne à l'oubli. Je maudis le fruit de tout labeur entrepris en son nom et formate toute particule de mémoire contenant sa connaissance. Que le rite demeure inébranlable. Que la prêtrise de l'Adeptus Mechanicus ne forme plus qu'un. Qu'Amarnat et l'hérésie d'interrompre le Cycle sombrent à jamais dans le néant. » {n}Les éclairs verts générés par le vox de Pasqal frappent soudain son cogitateur et deviennent d'un blanc incandescent avant de se dissiper tels des fantômes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I sentence it to oblivion. I curse the fruit of every labour ever undertaken in its name, and I reformat every particle of memory that contains its knowledge. May the Rite be unshakeable. May the Adeptus Mechanicus priesthood be as one. May Amarnat and the heresy of Discontinuing the Cycle lapse into oblivion forever." {n}The green lightning bolts produced by Pasqal's vox strike his cogitator and turn white-hot. Then... they subside and fade away like ghosts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi, je le condamne à l'oubli. Je maudis le fruit de tout labeur entrepris en son nom et formate toute particule de mémoire contenant sa connaissance. Que le rite demeure inébranlable. Que la prêtrise de l'Adeptus Mechanicus ne forme plus qu'un. Qu'Amarnat et l'hérésie d'interrompre le Cycle sombrent à jamais dans le néant. » {n}Les éclairs verts générés par le vox de Pasqal frappent soudain son cogitateur et deviennent d'un blanc incandescent avant de se dissiper tels des fantômes.{/n}

languages.text: «Lo condeno al olvido. Maldigo el fruto de cada acción realizada en su nombre, y reformateo cada partícula de memoria que contiene su conocimiento. Que el Rito sea inquebrantable. Que el sacerdocio del Adeptus Mechanicus sea uno solo. Que Amarnat y la herejía de interrumpir el Ciclo caigan en el olvido para siempre». {n}Los rayos verdes producidos por el voco de Pasqal se apoderan de su cogitador y se vuelven incandescentes. Luego... se calman y desaparecen como si fueran fantasmas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I sentence it to oblivion. I curse the fruit of every labour ever undertaken in its name, and I reformat every particle of memory that contains its knowledge. May the Rite be unshakeable. May the Adeptus Mechanicus priesthood be as one. May Amarnat and the heresy of discontinuing the Cycle lapse into oblivion forever." {n}The green lightning bolts produced by Pasqal's vox strike his cogitator and turn white-hot. Then... they subside and fade away like ghosts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo condeno al olvido. Maldigo el fruto de cada acción realizada en su nombre, y reformateo cada partícula de memoria que contiene su conocimiento. Que el Rito sea inquebrantable. Que el sacerdocio del Mechanicus sea uno solo. Que Amarnat y la herejía de interrumpir el Ciclo caigan en el olvido para siempre». {n}Las luces verdes producidas por el voco de Pasqal se apoderan de su cogitador y se vuelven incandescentes. Luego... se calman y desaparecen como si fueran fantasmas.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich verurteile es zum ewigen Vergessen. Ich verfluche die Frucht jeder Arbeit, die je in seinem Namen verrichtet wurde, und ich reformatiere jedes Speicherpartikel, das sein Wissen enthält. Möge der Ritus unerschütterlich sein. Möge die Adeptus-Mechanicus-Priesterschaft geeint sein. Mögen Amarnat und die Ketzerei der Unterbrechung des Zyklus für immer im Vergessen verschwinden." {n}Die grünen Blitze, die aus Pasqals Vox hervorgehen, treffen seinen Cogitator und werden glühend heiß. Dann ... verblassen und verschwinden sie wie Geister.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I sentence it to oblivion. I curse the fruit of every labour ever undertaken in its name, and I reformat every particle of memory that contains its knowledge. May the Rite be unshakeable. May the Adeptus Mechanicus priesthood be as one. May Amarnat and the heresy of discontinuing the Cycle lapse into oblivion forever." {n}The green lightning bolts produced by Pasqal's vox strike his cogitator and turn white-hot. Then... they subside and fade away like ghosts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich verurteile es zum ewigen Vergessen. Ich verfluche die Frucht jeder Arbeit, die je in seinem Namen verrichtet wurde, und ich reformatiere jedes Speicherpartikel, das sein Wissen enthält. Möge der Ritus unerschütterlich sein. Möge die Mechanicus-Priesterschaft geeint sein. Mögen Amarnat und die Ketzerei der Unterbrechung des Zyklus für immer im Vergessen verschwinden." {n}Die grünen Blitze, die aus Pasqals Vox hervorgehen, treffen seinen Cogitator und werden glühend heiß. Dann ... verblassen und verschwinden sie wie Geister.{/n}

languages.text: "Onu yok oluşa mahkûm ediyorum. Adına sarf edilen her bir çabanın her bir meyvesini lanetliyorum ve ona dair bilgileri içeren her hafıza parçacığını yeniden formatlıyorum. Ayin sarsılmaz kalsın. Adeptus Mechanicus rahipliği tek bir bütün olsun. Amarnat ve Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu kâfirliği unutulmaya yüz tutsun." {n}Voksundan üretilen yeşil elektrik yıldırımları Pasqal'ın kavramsayarına çarparak akkora dönüşüyor, ardından durularak hayalet gibi kayboluyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I sentence it to oblivion. I curse the fruit of every labour ever undertaken in its name, and I reformat every particle of memory that contains its knowledge. May the Rite be unshakeable. May the Adeptus Mechanicus priesthood be as one. May Amarnat and the heresy of Discontinuing the Cycle lapse into oblivion forever." {n}The green lightning bolts produced by Pasqal's vox strike his cogitator and turn white-hot. Then... they subside and fade away like ghosts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Onu yok oluşa mahkûm ediyorum. Adına sarf edilen her bir çabanın her bir meyvesini lanetliyorum ve ona dair bilgileri içeren her hafıza parçacığını yeniden formatlıyorum. Dinimiz sarsılmaz kalsın. Adeptus Mechanicus rahipliği bütün kalsın. Amarnat ve Döngü'nün süreğini bozma kâfirliği sonsuzluğu boylasın." {n}Voksundan üretilen yeşil elektrik okları Pasqal'ın kavramsayarına çarpıyor ve akkora dönüşüyor, ardından duruluyor ve hayalet gibi kayboluyorlar.{/n}

"Onu yok oluşa mahkûm ediyorum. Adına sarf edilen her bir çabanın her bir meyvesini lanetliyorum ve ona dair bilgileri içeren her hafıza parçacığını yeniden formatlıyorum. Dinimiz sarsılmaz kalsın. Adeptus Mechanicus rahipliği bütün kalsın. Amarnat ve Döngü'nün süreğini bozma kâfirliği sonsuzluğu boylasın." {n}Voksundan üretilen yeşil elektrik okları Pasqal'ın kavramsayarına çarpıyor ve akkora dönüşüyor, ardından duruluyor ve hayalet gibi kayboluyorlar.{/n}
